00002 #define METHODT_H
00003 //
00004 // Package:    PhysicsTools/LiteAnalysis

00011 // If using Python, include its header first to avoid annoying compiler
00012 // complaints.
00013 #include <Python.h>

00029 
00030 // This class models functions of the form
00031 //
00032 //  <simple-return-type> function(<simple-type>)
00033 //
00034 // where <simple-return-type> is a simple type like float and <simple-type> 
00035 // is typically void. The function could be compound, for example:
00036 // y = o->track()->pt()
00037 
00038 template <typename T>
00039 struct MethodT 
00040 {
00041   MethodT() {}
00042   
00043   MethodT(const std::string expression)
00044     : expression_(expression),
00045       expression1_(""),
00046       expression2_(""),
00047       classname_(boost::python::type_id<T>().name()),
00048       type_(ROOT::Reflex::Type::ByTypeInfo(typeid(T))),
00049       compoundMethod_(false),
00050       checkReturn_(false)
00051   {
00052     if ( getenv("DEBUGMETHOD") > 0 )
00053       debug_ = atoi(getenv("DEBUGMETHOD"));
00054     else
00055       debug_ = 0;
00056 
00057     // method could be of the form
00058     // y = method1(...)->method2(...) or
00059     // y = method1(...).method2(...) or
00060     // y = method1(..).variable
00061     boost::regex expr("(?<=[)]) *([-][>]|[.]) *(?=[a-zA-Z])");
00062     boost::smatch what;
00063 
00064     if ( debug_ > 0 )
00065       std::cout << "Expression( " 
00066                 << BLUE << expression_ <<  BLACK << " )" << std::endl;
00067 
00068     compoundMethod_ = boost::regex_search(expression_, what, expr);
00069     
00070     // If method is compound, use CINT to evaluate it
00071     
00072     if ( compoundMethod_ )
00073       {
00074         if ( debug_ > 0 )
00075           std::cout << "Method - " 
00076                     << RED << "compound method" 
00077                     << BLACK 
00078                     << std::endl;
00079         
00080         std::string delim(what[0]);
00081 
00082         if ( debug_ > 0 )
00083           std::cout << "         delimeter: (" << delim << ")" << std::endl;
00084 
00085         kit::bisplit(expression_, expression1_, expression2_, delim);
00086 
00087         // Get return type of 1st part of compound method
00088         // and determine if it is a pointer 
00089 
00090         std::vector<kit::ValueThing*> values;
00091         std::vector<void*> args;
00092         Reflex::Member method = kit::decodeMethod(classname_,
00093                                                   expression1_,
00094                                                   values,
00095                                                   args);
00096         if ( !kit::memberValid(method) )
00097           throw edm::Exception(edm::errors::Configuration,
00098                                "I'm too stupid to decode \"" 
00099                                + RED + expression1_ + BLACK + "\"\n");
00100 
00101         // Command to set address of object
00102         char cmd[1024];
00103 
00104         sprintf(cmd, "gROOT->Reset(); %s* o = (%s*)0x%s", 
00105                 classname_.c_str(), classname_.c_str(), "%x");
00106         setAddress_ = std::string(cmd);
00107 
00108         // Check return type 
00109         if ( kit::returnsPointer(method) )
00110           {
00111             // Returns a simple pointer
00112             checkReturn_ = true;
00113             sprintf(cmd, "o->%s", expression1_.c_str());
00114           }
00115         else
00116           {
00117             Reflex::Member isNull = kit::getisNull(method); 
00118             if ( kit::memberValid(isNull) )
00119               {
00120                 checkReturn_ = true;
00121                 sprintf(cmd, "o->%s.get()", expression1_.c_str());
00122               }
00123             else
00124               {
00125                 sprintf(cmd, "%s", "");
00126               }
00127           }
00128         callMethod1_ = std::string(cmd);
00129 
00130         sprintf(cmd, "kit::set(o->%s, x)", expression_.c_str());
00131         compoundCall_ = std::string(cmd);
00132       }
00133     else
00134       {
00135         if ( debug_ > 0 )
00136           std::cout << "Method - " 
00137                     << RED << "simple method" 
00138                     << BLACK 
00139                     << std::endl;
00140 
00141         // This is a simple method, so use
00142         // expression parser to evaluate it
00143 
00144         expression1_ = expression_;
00145         if(!reco::parser::expressionParser<T>(expression1_, expr1_)) 
00146           {
00147             throw edm::Exception(edm::errors::Configuration,
00148                                  "Since I'm a cyber ignoramous, "
00149                                  "I'm too stupid to understand \"" 
00150                                  + RED + expression1_ + BLACK + "\"\n");
00151           }
00152       }
00153 
00154     if ( debug_ > 0 )
00155       std::cout << "Method - 1: " << expression1_ << std::endl
00156                 << "         2: " << expression2_ << std::endl;
00157     
00158   }
00159   
00160   std::string name() const
00161   {
00162     return std::string(boost::python::type_id<T>().name()) 
00163       + "/" + expression_;
00164   }
00165 
00166   double operator()(const T& t)
00167   {
00168     using namespace ROOT::Reflex;
00169 
00170     if ( !compoundMethod_ )
00171       {
00172         if ( debug_ > 0 )
00173           //DB
00174           std::cout << "simpleMethod(" << classname_ << "): " 
00175                     << GREEN 
00176                     << expression_
00177                     << BLACK
00178                     << std::endl;
00179 
00180         Object o(type_, const_cast<T*>(&t));
00181         double x = expr1_->value(o);
00182 
00183         if ( debug_ > 0 )
00184           //DB
00185           std::cout << "  return: " 
00186                     << RED 
00187                     << x
00188                     << BLACK
00189                     << std::endl;
00190         return x;
00191       }
00192     else
00193       {
00194         if ( debug_ > 0 )
00195           std::cout << "compoundMethod(" << classname_ << "): " 
00196                     << RED 
00197                     << expression_
00198                     << BLACK
00199                     << std::endl
00200                     << " setAddress: " 
00201                     << RED 
00202                     << setAddress_
00203                     << BLACK
00204                     << std::endl;
00205 
00206         gROOT->ProcessLine(Form(setAddress_.c_str(), &t)); 
00207         if ( checkReturn_ )
00208           {
00209             if ( debug_ > 0 )
00210               //DB
00211               std::cout << "   checkReturn: " 
00212                         << RED 
00213                         << callMethod1_
00214                         << BLACK
00215                         << std::endl;
00216             void* y = 0;
00217             try
00218               {
00219                 y = (void*)gROOT->ProcessLineFast(callMethod1_.c_str());
00220               }
00221             catch (...)
00222               {}
00223 
00224             if ( y == 0 )
00225               {
00226                 double x = -99999;
00227             
00228                 if ( debug_ > 0 )
00229                   //DB
00230                   std::cout << "     return: " 
00231                             << RED 
00232                             << x
00233                             << BLACK
00234                             << std::endl;
00235                 return x;
00236               }
00237           }
00238 
00239         // We have a valid pointer, so proceed
00240 
00241         double x = 0;
00242         gROOT->ProcessLine(Form("double* x = (double*)0x%x", &x));
00243 
00244         if ( debug_ > 0 )
00245           //DB
00246           std::cout << "     callCompound: " 
00247                     << RED 
00248                     << compoundCall_
00249                     << BLACK
00250                     << std::endl;
00251 
00252         try
00253           {
00254             gROOT->ProcessLineFast(compoundCall_.c_str());
00255           }
00256         catch (...)
00257           {}
00258 
00259         if ( debug_ > 0 )
00260           //DB
00261           std::cout << "       return: " 
00262                     << RED 
00263                     << x
00264                     << BLACK
00265                     << std::endl;
00266         return x;
00267       }
00268   }
00269   
00270 private:
00271 
00272   std::string expression_;
00273   std::string expression1_;
00274   std::string expression2_;
00275   std::string classname_;
00276   ROOT::Reflex::Type type_;
00277   reco::parser::ExpressionPtr expr1_;
00278 
00279   bool compoundMethod_;
00280   bool checkReturn_;
00281 
00282   std::string setAddress_;
00283   std::string callMethod1_;
00284   std::string compoundCall_;
00285 
00286   int debug_;
00287 };
00288 
00289 #endif
